title: Shark HydroVac Cordless Pro 3-in-1 Vacuum, Mop and Self-Cleaning System, Lightweight, Antimicrobial Brushroll, 12oz Odor Neutralizing Concentrate for Hard Floors and Area Rugs, Polar White, WD200
description: Shark HydroVac Cordless Pro WD200 vacuums, mops and cleans itself with powerful suction and hydro mopping at the same time for deep multi-surface cleaning. Lightweight cordless cleaner for hardwood floors, tile, marble, laminate, area rugs and more. Features a self-cleaning, antimicrobial brushroll that helps prevent odors and bacterial growth on the brushroll; 2-tank system to separate clean & dirty water; LED display to monitor real-time cleaning progress, ultra-fast dry time so you can walk on floors almost immediately and multi-surface cleaning concentrate with odor neutralizer technology. Easily deep clean your hard floors and area rugs with the Shark HydroVac. Brushroll treated with antimicrobial substance to preserve roller and resist bacterial odors on the brushroll.
